```{r, out.width="80%", message=FALSE}
library(tmap)
tmap_mode("view")
locations = tmaptools::geocode_OSM(c("leeds", "poznan", "nurnberg", "saint-pierre-d'oleron"), as.sf = TRUE)
tm_shape(locations) +
  tm_dots(col = "red", size = 0.1, alpha = 0.5, popup.vars = "query") +
  tm_text("query")
```
